Question: This person sold the rights to his memoirs to Bantam Books for $5,000,000.
Hints: This person graduated valedictorian out of his class of 150, and his IQ was tested at 168.
This person sent a prepared statement to the troops ahead of the first airstrikes, which were timed to hit their targets at 02:40.
Following his success in the Gulf War, this person indicated a desire to retire from the military in mid-1991.
